profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description: Senior Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience in .NET, C#, and software architecture. I've built scalable, high-performance solutions across Private Equity, Pharma, and Innovation, ensuring efficiency, security, and maintainability. PMP-certified, with expertise in leading agile teams and managing complex projects. Currently expanding my knowledge in AI & DevOps, integrating modern technologies into software development. Passionate about mentorship, problem-solving, and driving innovation through technology.

shortBio.title: Hello, I'm Mina Narmer
shortBio.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in backend development, system design, and AI solutions. I create robust, scalable applications using cutting-edge technologies.

about.professionalDescription1: I'm a specialized software engineer with extensive experience in developing complex web applications and microservice systems. I've worked on diverse projects ranging from SaaS applications to AI and machine learning solutions.
about.professionalDescription2: I have a particular passion for clean architecture and software best practices that lead to robust, maintainable systems. I'm currently working on developing innovative technical solutions that combine engaging user interfaces with advanced algorithms.

bio.title: About Me
bio.paragraph1: I'm a Senior Software Engineer with over 7 years of experience in .NET, C#, and software architecture. I've built scalable, high-performance solutions across Private Equity, Pharma, and Innovation sectors, ensuring efficiency, security, and maintainability.
bio.paragraph2: PMP-certified, with expertise in leading agile teams and managing complex projects. Currently expanding my knowledge in AI & DevOps, integrating modern technologies into software development. Passionate about mentorship, problem-solving, and driving innovation through technology.
